abstract: Police in Pasco, Wash, say internal investigation has found three police officers involved in fatal shooting of Antonio Zambrano-Montes did not violate policies or procedures of department and will return to work.
lead_paragraph: Three police officers who fatally shot a rock-throwing Hispanic man in Pasco, Wash., did not violate department policies or procedures, according to the findings of an internal investigation.

headline.main: Washington State Officers Are Cleared in Shooting
headline.print_headline: Washington State Officers Are Cleared in Shooting

snippet: Three police officers who fatally shot a rock-throwing Hispanic man in Pasco, Wash., did not violate department policies or procedures, according to the findings of an internal investigation.
